page.title: Oracle: PeopleSoft Board to Reject Bid
page.text: PHILADELPHIA (Reuters) - Software maker Oracle Corp. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=ORCL.O target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">ORCL.O</A> on Wednesday said it will let PeopleSoft Inc. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=PSFT.O target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">PSFT.O</A> shareholders decide for themselves whether to accept Oracle's \$8.8 billion hostile takeover bid after learning that PeopleSoft's board of directors will reject it.
